title-group.article-title: Correction: Cardiac Troponin T (TNNT2) plays a potential oncogenic role in colorectal carcinogenesis

custom-meta.meta-value: © BioMed Central Ltd., part of Springer Nature 2023

body.p: In this article [1], the order that the authors appeared in the author list was incorrect, the order of co-authors Yibing Liu and Zhiguo Zhou were inadvertently transposed.
The original article has been corrected.

fn.p: The online version of the original article can be found at 10.1186/s12935-023-02977-9.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
Yifan Liu, Ze Meng and Junqiang Niu have contributed equally to this work and share the first authorship.

ref.mixed-citation: Liu Y, Meng Z, Niu J, et al. Cardiac Troponin T (TNNT2) plays a potential oncogenic role in colorectal carcinogenesis. Cancer Cell Int 2023;23:146. 10.1186/s12935-023-02977-9
